descriptionHtml:
[font=Times New Roman][size=6][center]Isabela[/center][/size][/font][img]https://s7.postimg.cc/j4fwtr0ln/82126-0-1486926951.jpg[/img]



[center][size=4]Name: Isabela[/size]
[size=4]Race: Nord[/size]
[size=4]Voice:  Female Sultry[/size]
[size=4]Marriageable:  Yes[/size]
[size=4]Weight:  80[/size]
[size=4]Body:UNP[/size]
[size=4]Skin:  SG Female Textures[/size]
[size=4]Armor:  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49130/?]Velvet Robes And Cloaks[/url][/size]
[size=4]Class:  Combat Sorcerer[/size]
[size=4]Levels with player.[/size]
[size=4]Spells: Fast healing, Firebolt, Flames ,Frostbite, Healing hands, Icespike,[/size]
[size=4]Lightingbolt, Sparks[/size]
[size=4] [/size]
[size=4]Perks: Destruction, Restoration, Dual casting, Respite, Impact agile defender,[/size]
[size=4]Windwaker, Deftmovement, Alteration, Lightfoot[/size]


[size=4]You can also get her [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80455/?]preset[/url]!![/size]
[size=4]Screenshots are appreciated![/size]
[size=5]Recommended[/size]
[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Facelight[/url][/size]

[size=4] [/size]
[size=6]Location: Drangonsreach
